original: Bodinson, Gustaf Adolf, distriktsveterinär, Mellerud, f. 27/2/04 i Enång-er, Gävleb. 1. Fosterföräldr.: kontr :-prost W. Gustavsson o. h. h. f. Bodinson. G. 42 m. Brita Brolinson. Barn: Kristina f. 43, Karl-Gustav 46. — Stud:ex. i Upps. 23, veter:ex. 31. Distr :veter. i Föllinge 36-43, i Melle-rud fr. 43, besiktn :veter. fr. 43. Hob-bics: jakt, skytte. SkytteSm.
translated: Bodinson, Gustaf Adolf, district veterinarian, Mellerud, born on February 27, 1904 in Enånger, Gävleborg County. Adoptive parents: chaplain W. Gustavsson and his wife, h. h. f. Bodinson. Married in 1942 to Brita Brolinson. Children: Kristina, born in 1943, and Karl-Gustav, born in 1946. Gustaf passed his student exam in Uppsala in 1923, and his veterinary exam in 1931. He worked as a district veterinarian in Föllinge from 1936 to 1943, and in Mellerud from 1943, also inspecting animals from 1943. His hobbies were hunting and shooting. He was a member of the Shooting Sports.
